        Parameters:

        x2 - The x-axis coordinate of the second point

        public static double ptLineDist​(double x1,
                                double y1,
                                double x2,
                                double y2,
                                double px,
                                double py)
        Returns the distance from a point to a (infinite) line
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x-axis coordinate of the start point of the line
        y1 - The y-axis coordinate of the start point of the line
        x2 - The x-axis coordinate of the end point of the line
        y2 - The y-axis coordinate of the end point of the line
        px - The x-axis coordinate of the point
        py - The y-axis coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        The distance

      • nearestPointInGrid

        public static Z4Point nearestPointInGrid​(double x,
                                         double y,
                                         double cx,
                                         double cy,
                                         int plotWidth,
                                         double magnetismPercentage)
        Returns, give a point and a grid, the point in the grid with the minimum distance from the given point
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the point
        cx - The x-axis coordinate of the grid center
        cy - The y-axis coordinate of the grid center
        plotWidth - The grid plot width
        magnetismPercentage - The grid magnetism percentage, in the range ]0,1]
        Returns:
        The point in the grid with the minimum distance from the given point, if the given point is inside the magnetism area, null otherwise

      • atan

        public static double atan​(double x0,
                          double y0,
                          double x,
                          double y)
        Returns the theta component of a point or a vector, in polar coordinates. The value is normalized in the range [0,2*PI]
        Parameters:
        x0 - The x-axis coordinate of the start point
        y0 - The y-axis coordinate of the start point
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the end point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the end point
        Returns:
        The theta component of a point or a vector, in polar coordinates

        public static Z4Point rotate​(double x,
                             double y,
                             double angle)
        Rotates a point by an angle
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the point
        angle - The angle (in radians)
        Returns:
        The rotated point

      • rotoTranslate

        public static Z4Point rotoTranslate​(double x,
                                    double y,
                                    double angle,
                                    double tx,
                                    double ty)
        Rotates a point by an angle and then translates it
        Parameters:
        x - The x-axis coordinate of the point
        y - The y-axis coordinate of the point
        angle - The angle (in radians)
        tx - The x-axis translation
        ty - The y-axis translation
        Returns:
        The rotated point

        public static double ripple​(double value,
                            double min,
                            double max,
                            double ripple)
        Generates a ripple around a value
        Parameters:
        value - The value
        min - The minimum allowed value
        max - The maximum allowed value
        ripple - The ripple (in the range [0,1])
        Returns:
        The rippled value

      • getPolygonVertices

        public static def.js.Array<Z4Point> getPolygonVertices​(int vertexCount)
        Returns the vertices of a polygon inscribed in a circle with radius = 1
        Parameters:
        vertexCount - The vertex count
        Returns:
        The vertices

      • getStarVertices

        public static def.js.Array<Z4Point> getStarVertices​(int vertexCount)
        Returns the vertices of a star inscribed in a circle with radius = 1
        Parameters:
        vertexCount - The vertex count
        Returns:
        The vertices

      • butterfly

        public static def.js.Array<Z4Point> butterfly​(Z4Vector vector,
                                              double alpha)
        Calculates the control points of a Bezier curve, having coincident starting (S) and ending (E) points, passing through a given point (P), included in a given angle (A) and symmetrical with respect to the straight line passing through the starting point (S) and the given point (P)
        Parameters:
        vector - The vector starting at the starting point (S) and ending at the given point (P)
        alpha - The angle (A) including the Bezier curve, in radians
        Returns:
        An array of two points containing the first and second control points of the Bezier curve

      • randomCorrected

        public static double randomCorrected​(double factor)
        Evaluates a random number by using a correction factor given by the law f(x,y)=pow(x,1/y) with y>=1
        Parameters:
        factor - The correction factor
        Returns:
        The random number with the correction factor
